mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_tb (subscription_id, amount, payment_method, payment_status, payment_date, external_payment_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{subscriptionId}, #{amount}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentStatus}, #{paymentDate}, #{externalPaymentId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM payment_tb p INNER JOIN subscription_tb s ON p.subscription_id = s.subscription_id WHERE s.company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC, p.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE payment_tb SET payment_status = #{paymentStatus}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE payment_id = #{paymentId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM payment_tb p ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC, p.created_at DESC
